title: ENGLISH DISHES
subtitle: All served with salad, tomato and peas.

items.name: Vegetables Samosa (v)
items.description: Two crisp pastries with filling of vegetables.

items.name: Meat Samosa
items.description: Two crisp pastries with filling of lamb.

items.name: Onion Bhaji (v)
items.description: Finely sliced onions coated in gram flour & spices, deep fried.

items.name: Chicken Manchurian
items.description: Tender pieces of chicken stir-fried with garlic, capsicum & spices.

items.name: Lamb Boti Puri
items.description: Tender pieces of succulent stir-fried lamb boti, tossed with fresh mint, mango, crushed chillies and kaffir lime, garnished in a puri.

items.name: Chicken Chat
items.description: Stir-fried tender pieces of chicken roasted with sweet chilli, cucumber and turmeric.

items.name: Spicy Wings
items.description: Chicken wings marinated in yogurt and spices.

items.name: Chicken Tikka
items.description: Pieces of chicken marinated with yogurt and fresh herbs & spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven.

items.name: Lamb Tikka
items.description: Pieces of lamb marinated with yogurt and fresh herbs & spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven.

items.name: Sheek Kebab
items.description: Minced lamb with onions, special herbs & spices, skewered & cooked in a tandoori clay oven.

items.name: Chicken Kebab
items.description: Minced chicken mixed with special herbs & spices, skewered & cooked in a tandoori clay oven.

items.name: Mix Kebab
items.description: An assortment of chicken tikka, lamb tikka, sheek kebab & spicy chicken wings.

items.name: Chicken or Lamb Shashlick
items.description: Pieces of tender chicken marinated in herbs & spices, cooked with onions, tomatoes & capsicum.

items.name: Tandoori Lamb Chops
items.description: Smoked green herb tikka smothered with garam masala.

items.name: Tandoori Chicken
items.description: Pieces of chicken breast marinated with yogurt & fresh herbs & spices, cooked in tandoori in hot chilli & garlic marinade.

items.name: Chilli Paneer
items.description: Deep fried homemade Indian cottage cheese with sweet red peppers, spring onions & coriander in a hot chilli & garlic marinade.

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Deep fried homemade Indian cottage cheese marinated in spices and cooked in clay oven served with salad.

items.name: Hot Meat
items.description: Stir fried tender pieces of lamb tossed with fresh green chilli cooked with garlic peppers herb and spices.

items.name: Sizzling Tandoori Platter (share for 2)
items.description: An assortment of green herb lamb tikka, chicken tikka & salmon supreme tikka perfect for those looking to share.

items.name: Sizzling Vegetable Platter (share for 2)
items.description: For those seeking a vegetarian alternative. A combination of paneer shashlik, onion bhaji & aloo chaat.

items.name: Prawn Cocktail
items.description: Succulent prawns, mixed with salad & served with cocktail sauce.

items.name: Fish Chilli
items.description: Tilapia fish fried with capsicum, green chilli & spring onion in soya sauce.

items.name: Salmon Supreme Tikka
items.description: Grilled fillet of salmon marinated in a rich spicy sauce of dill, ginger & honey.

items.name: King Prawns Tandoori
items.description: King prawns marinated in yogurt and special ground spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven.

items.name: King Prawn Puree
items.description: Lightly spiced king prawn in a touch of sauce. Served on a puffed bread.

items.name: Tandoori Chicken (half)
items.description: Tender chicken on the bone marinated in yogurt, ginger, tandoori spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven, served on a bed of fried onions.

items.name: Chicken Tikka
items.description: Breast of chicken diced & marinated in yogurt, ginger, tandoori spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven, served on a bed of fried onions.

items.name: Lamb Tikka
items.description: Lamb tikka marinated in yogurt, ginger, tandoori spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven, served on a bed of fried onions.

items.name: King Prawn Tandoori
items.description: King prawn, marinated in yogurt and special ground spices, cooked in a tandoori clay oven, served on a bed of fried onions.

items.name: Maharajah Mixed Grill
items.description: An assortment of tandoori chicken, chicken tikka, lamb tikka, king prawn, sheek kebab & chicken wings.

items.name: Paneer Shashlick (Saucy)
items.description: Home made Indian cottage cheese marinated with mild spices tossed with grilled onion, pepper & tomatoes.

items.name: Chicken Tikka / Lamb Tikka Shashlick (Saucy / Dry)
items.description: Marinated with green herbs & yogurt cooked with tomatoes, green pepper & onions.

items.name: King Prawn Shashlick (Dry)
items.description: Marinated with tandoori spices barbecued in the clay oven with green peppers, onions & tomato.

items.name: Tandoori Fish Tikka
items.description: Fish marinated in special herbs barbecued in tandoori clay oven.

items.name: Monk Fish Shashlick
items.description: Chunks of succulent wild monk fish, marinated in a special tandoori blend of spice, cooked over charcoal, finished with a dressing of peppers, lemon grass, tomatoes.

items.description: Cooked in a thick & creamy special mild tandoori sauce, with ground almond, coconut & fresh cream.

items.description: Cooked in a thick & creamy special mild tandoori sauce, with ground almond, coconut & fresh cream.

items.description: Cooked in a thick & creamy special mild tandoori sauce, with ground almond, coconut & fresh cream.

items.description: Cooked in a thick & creamy special mild tandoori sauce, with ground almond, coconut & fresh cream.

items.description: Cooked in a thick & creamy special mild tandoori sauce, with ground almond, coconut & fresh cream.

items.description: Cooked in a thick & creamy special mild tandoori sauce, with ground almond, coconut & fresh cream.

title: Tawa
subtitle: Specially cooked with garam masala, tomatoes, ring onions served in a cast iron tawa.

items.name: Sea Food Tawa (King Prawns, Tilapia, Salmon, Prawns)

title: Balti
subtitle: Cooked with traditinal spices, fresh onions, peppers, tomatoes, and garnished with coriander. Served in a iron wok with a naan

items.name: Mixed Balti (Tandoori Chicken, Chicken & Lamb Tikka, Sheek Kebab, King Prawns)
Sea Food Balti (King Prawns, Tilapia, Salmon)

title: Traditional Indian Dishes
subtitle: All your traditional favourite dishes can be made to your taste

items.name: Chicken Tikka Jalfrezi
items.description: This dish is cooked with fresh garlic, onions, tomato, coriander, green chillies and mustard paste & a selection of herbs & spices.

items.name: Chicken or Lamb Makhani
items.description: The chicken or lamb is cooked in almond, coconut, milk and the chef’s special spices to give this dish a mild flavour.

items.name: Garlic Chilli Masala Chicken or Lamb
items.description: Marinated in selected spices, then it is cooked to perfection with onion, tomato, green chillies, garlic and ginger.

items.name: Bringel Gosht
items.description: Lamb cooked with rich spices & fresh aubergine & fresh mint leaves.

items.name: Methi Gosht
items.description: Lamb prepared with fresh fenugreek leaves & cooked in special spicy sauce.

items.name: Naga
items.description: Chicken Tikka marinated in garam masala with onions, pepper & naga chilli. A very hot dish.

items.name: Hyderabadi
items.description: Stir fried with tangy spices green coriander, fresh sour yogurt, tomatoes, garlic and ginger puree in juices of bay leaves, cardamoms and cloves.

items.name: Jhinga Chingri
items.description: King prawns marinated in ground spices & barbequed in a clay oven.

items.name: Paneer Tikka Bhuna Masala
items.description: Homemade Indian cheese, cooked in clay oven & then tossed in a garam masala sauce with fresh tomatoes.

items.name: Slow Cooked Lamb Shank
items.description: Adopting an ancient recipe, pre baked lamb is slow cooked ensuring it has a complex melange of fresh garlic, ginger, turmeric, star anise, cloves and corn plums.

items.name: Fish Bhuna
items.description: Tilapia Bangladeshi fish cooked in chef’s special spices medium bhuna strength sauce. Served in a sized tawa.

items.name: Chicken or Lamb Saagwala
items.description: A dish prepared using leaves of the finest spinach. Seasoned with fresh spices and fresh coriander.

items.name: Chef’s Special Tikka Dish Bemisal
items.description: Charcoal Grilled Garlic Grilled Scottish Salmon in a characteristic smooth sauce where the smoothness of the buttery tomato & onion sauce with lemon grass sauce is complimented by sautéed brown onions.

items.name: Harrison Spice Special (Medium)
items.description: A special mixture of the chef's favourite ingredients creating a delightful dish to savour chicken or meat, chick peas, spinach & in a special chef's sauce with added bay leaves for added flavour.

items.name: King Prawn Aftabi
items.description: A traditional Bangladeshi classic king prawn & green beans, slowly cooked in our specially prepared spices, a dish full of flavour & pleasantly aromatic (fairly hot).

items.name: Achari Chicken Tikka / Lamb
items.description: A delightful dish medium spiced cooked with an Indian pickle to create a slight citrus taste.

items.name: Rezela Chicken Tikka / Lamb
items.description: Tender pieces of chicken or lamb tikka cooked in a delicately spiced fresh ginger sauce.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Rogan Josh
items.description: A tomato based, a medium hot dish cooked with fresh garlic, capsicum & onion, finished with rich tomato sauce.

items.name: Murgh Chilli Masala
items.description: Tandoori chicken shredded off the bone cooked with mince meat and chef's special sauce, infused with fresh green chillies.

title: KARAHI
subtitle: Cooked with garam masala, cardamom & cloves in a thick medium strength sauce with a generous quantity of garlic with deep fried onions, capsicums & tomatoes.

items.name: Sea Food Karahi
items.description: King Prawns, Tilapia, Salmon, Prawns.

title: BIRIYANI DISHES
subtitle: Biryani dishes flavoured with a touch of saffron, complimented with a vegetable curry sauce.

items.name: Lamb Tikka, Chicken Tikka & Mince Meat Biryani
